text: Huang Huoqing (; 1901 – November 9, 1999) was a politician of the People's Republic of China. ==Biography== Huang Huoqing was born in Zaoyang County, Hubei in 1901. He joined the Communist Party of China in 1926. After the foundation of the People's Republic of China, Huang was the Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Committee from 1953 to 1958, and the CPC Liaoning Committee from 1958 to 1971. Huang was the Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate from 1978 to 1983. ==References== ==External links== * Biography of Huang Huoqing, CPC Liaoning Committee website. title: Huang Huoqing
